size.title: size
size.description: Image resolution: 1K (1024px), 2K (2048px), 4K (4096px), or 'custom' for specific dimensions.

output_size.title: output_size
output_size.description: Image resolution: 1K (1024px), 2K (2048px), 4K (4096px), or 'custom' for specific dimensions.

width.title: Width
width.description: Custom image width (only used when size='custom'). Range: 1024-4096 pixels.

height.title: Height
height.description: Custom image height (only used when size='custom'). Range: 1024-4096 pixels.

max_images.title: Max Images
max_images.description: Maximum number of images to generate when sequential_image_generation='auto'. Range: 1-15. Total images (input + generated) cannot exceed 15.

image_input.title: Image Input
image_input.description: Input image(s) for image-to-image generation. List of 1-10 images for single or multi-reference generation.

aspect_ratio.title: aspect_ratio
aspect_ratio.description: Image aspect ratio. Only used when size is not 'custom'. Use 'match_input_image' to automatically match the input image's aspect ratio.

enhance_prompt.title: Enhance Prompt
enhance_prompt.description: Enable prompt enhancement for higher quality results, this will take longer to generate.

sequential_image_generation.title: sequential_image_generation
sequential_image_generation.description: Group image generation mode. 'disabled' generates a single image. 'auto' lets the model decide whether to generate multiple related images (e.g., story scenes, character variations).
